verbose_text: Of interest, the intestinotrophic effects of GLP-2 are proposed to be mediated through IGF-1 expression [XREF_BIBR], and IGF-1 has been shown to enhance anastomotic wound healing with improved bursting strength and increased collagen deposition at the anastomosis [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: IGF-1 has been shown to enhance anastomotic wound healing with improved bursting strength and increased collagen
